description: Highly skilled software engineer with a Master's degree and two years of experience. Specializing in desktop application development, love to work with low level code. Focusing on concise, simple, and decoupled code architecture to achieve maintainable solutions. Proficient in a diverse range of technologies and frameworks. Passionate about delivering high-quality products that meet the needs of end-users while ensuring scalability and efficiency.

guidelines.title: Simplicity and Elegance
guidelines.description: Creating clear and elegant code, implementing complex features in a straightforward manner for maintainability.

guidelines.title: Iterative and Agile Approach
guidelines.description: Embracing an iterative and Agile development process to arrive at lasting solutions while meeting client needs effectively.

guidelines.title: Leveraging Existing Resources
guidelines.description: Maximizing efficiency by utilizing existing tools and knowledge, promoting a global perspective during development.

certifications.name: CCNA
certifications.description: CCNA 2 : Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials

educations.name: Master's degree in Computer Science
educations.description: Specialized in Software Engineering at CESI - Strasbourg (67)
